name: Jones, Appellant, v. McNichol Paving & Construction Company
name_abbreviation: Jones v. McNichol Paving & Construction Co.

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaefer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Jones, Appellant, v. McNichol Paving & Construction Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Stern.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: C. D. Swartz, of Swartz, Campbell & Henry, with him Raymond Pace Alexander, for appellant.
Charles E. Kenworthy, with him Ralph B. Evans, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Jones, Appellant, v. McNichol Paving & Construction Company.
Argued December 4, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaefer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
January 7, 1935:
C. D. Swartz, of Swartz, Campbell & Henry, with him Raymond Pace Alexander, for appellant.
Charles E. Kenworthy, with him Ralph B. Evans, for appellee.
